error.passwordPattern: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number and one special character!
headline: Get Accurate X-Ray Scan Analysis with Our AI-Powered CNN Algorithm
introduction: Our website uses cutting-edge AI technology to detect four common lung conditions from X-ray scans. Our quick and accurate analysis can help you receive early detection and treatment for these serious illnesses.
prediction.scan.info: Upload your chest X-ray for an AI analysis. Get fast and accurate diagnoses using our CNN technology.
prediction.scan.result: The CNN prediction indicates that the lung scan shows signs of {{result}}.
